website_summaries.verdict: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lo sneakers retain that classic style that has made these formerly “elite basketball shoes” a universal success. Although now geared more for the casual wearer, the sneakers continue to be highly-functional and durable and are often used for different physical activities that demand flat soles.The wide selection of prints and colorways only add to the shoes’ vast appeal. The easy slip on and off design is terribly convenient along with the low maintenance care these kicks require.
pros: Many users say that the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top shoes are comfortable and provide a “close to barefoot shoe experience.”
These lifestyle footwears are durable, according to several testers
A good number of people are pleased with the colorways of Chuck Taylor All Star Lo sneakers
A lot of reviewers find the casual low-tops to be perfect weightlifting shoes because the soles are quite flat and allow the wearer to plant his stance just right
Low-top Converse Chuck Taylors are classic shoes that you can’t go wrong with, a handful of buyers have remarked
Some individuals have found the low-top Converse Chuck Taylor All Stars easy to clean off
A few purchasers like how easy the lifestyle sneakers were to slip on and off
A couple of consumers have reported that Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top sneakers are breathable and perfect for the summer months because they’re not made of thick or heavy fabric
These sneakers from Converse don’t require much maintenance or care which pleases dozens of customers
cons: The low-top sneakers have flat soles with barely any arch support, several testers said
Unless you put in cushioned insoles, the shoes will pain your feet when used for extended periods, some have claimed

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart in less than 6 weeks. Probably fakes
customer_reviews.text: My partner bought these for my birthday in mid June. They've hardly been worn and they're already falling apart to the point of being pretty much useless. They looked slightly different to my older converse when i took them out the box but i didn't think much of it, I now realise they're likely fakes judging by the terrible quality. My old converse I'd had for 3 years and they were in better nick than these after just 5 weeks of light wear. DO NOT BUY THESE. Get a real pair from schuh or office for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS FOR ALL STARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these brand pair for the first time after wearing out my cheap version I've had for over 10 years and which are still wearable in dry weather. Usually a size 5 but ordered the 6 and they fit perfectly with that bit of extra room. Material is a lot stiffer at the back of heel, so will probably need some gel cushions for my hypersensitive and annoying feet! Having said that, they do look great and feel really cushioned under foot. And at a bargain price, I would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes in terms of aesthetics and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pair of shoes, colour is fantastic and so is the quality but the size is slightly too large accourding to Amazon sizing. I am usually Size UK 11 but went 11.5 based on Amazon suggestions.... I guess that way too big and I advise you go with your normal sizing with no adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super chuffed with these- got mine for £20 and they are definitely converse and just what you'd expect from these classic shoes- I won't be wearing anything else all spring!
customer_reviews.author: ness

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Chuck Taylors
customer_reviews.text: The ones I received are authentic and fit as expected. Wish I could get a size 5.5, because the 6 are a bit big, but I'll make them work. Arrived on time as well. Love the navy colour. Haven't had this colour since I was in high school (20 years ago - eeek). Excited to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: ArtistFemme

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I find I have to order converse a size and a half down from what I normally wear. The quality is great, just as it would be in the shops. The good think about the colour is that you can’t see dirt on it either
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pattinson

customer_reviews.title: but I bought 13 to be on the safe side and they fit perfect no problems with the shoes or the service
customer_reviews.text: These are genuine Converse, I normally take twelve and half if I can get that size, but I bought 13 to be on the safe side and they fit perfect no problems with the shoes or the service, all good.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Converse All Star- Blue
customer_reviews.text: These are my very first pair of converse trainers, I was very hesitant about buying them initially having had numerous problems with other flat shoes causing my feet to ache. I have to say not only are these shoes very stylish, but also incredibly comfortable, very reasonably priced,and they go with practically everything, I am very pleased with these shoes and will most likely buy another pair in a different colour,
